subject: Track and Field
Colleges and Universities
Age, Chronological
Discrimination
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Edwin Zarowin coached cross-country and track at Hunter for 31 years, until he was 88. Now, after rejecting an offer to be an archivist at the college, he has filed a discrimination complaint.
snippet: Edwin Zarowin coached cross-country and track at Hunter for 31 years, until he was 88. Now, after rejecting an offer to be an archivist at the college, he has filed a discrimination complaint.
